FuncDef: This command monitors arbiter statistics in an ingress FP queue group.
CLIs: card <slot-number> fp <fp-number> queue-group <queue-group-name> instance <instance-id> [ ingress ] [ access | network ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | percent-rate | <reference-rate> ] [ arbiter { root | <name> } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the slot number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 10.
Specifies the FP number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 8.
Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays arbiter-name statistics applied on the ingress FP.
Displays arbiter-name statistics applied on the FP access.
Displays arbiter-name statistics applied on the FP network.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic based on the reference rate of 10G.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic as a percentage based on the reference rate specified. Values-100M, 1G, 10G, 40G, 100G, 400G. ParamDefault: Default- 10G

Specifies the name of the policer control policy arbiter. Values-an existing arbiter-name in the form of a string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
